about.title: About Me
about.bio1: Hi! I'm Yaroslav, a Frontend Developer based in Warsaw, Poland. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in building responsive, accessible, and performant web applications.
about.bio2: I love turning complex problems into elegant solutions and creating interfaces that users enjoy. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or enjoying a good cup of coffee.
contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi? I'd love to hear from you.
